H0.text: Which business organisation took over the Somerfield chain of stores . Tesco

H1.text: Which business organisation took over the Somerfield chain of stores . Sainsbury's

H2.text: Which business organisation took over the Somerfield chain of stores . Asda

H3.text: Which business organisation took over the Somerfield chain of stores . CWS UK

A4.text: The Co-operative Group purchased the Somerfield chain of 900 supermarkets and convenience stores in July 2008 and completed the sale on 2 March 2009.
